definition: surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: We will energetically develop social welfare programs.
sentences.chinese: 積極發展社會福利事業。

sentences.english: The issuance of the welfare lottery ticket directly pushed the development of the our country welfare worked.
sentences.chinese: 福利彩票的發行直接推動了我國福利事業的發展。

sentences.english: Other public and welfare undertakings in society that aim to promote social development and progress. IV.Other public welfare undertakings promoting social development and progress.
sentences.chinese: 促進社會發展和進步的其他社會公共和福利事業。

sentences.english: He devoted all his life to the cause of children's welfare.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己的一生獻給了兒童福利事業。

sentences.english: Public welfare was described by some people as "bleeding the country white".
sentences.chinese: 有些人把公共福利事業說成是“在使國家流盡鮮血”。

sentences.english: The house has been condemned for the use of public welfare.
sentences.chinese: 那房子已被徵作公共福利事業用了。

sentences.english: In most of the advanced countries, the welfare work is well-developed.
sentences.chinese: 在多數先進國家福利事業發展健全。

sentences.english: If you can't contribute money to charity, give time.
sentences.chinese: 如果你無法捐錢給福利事業，給你時間。

sentences.english: The pension system contributes to welfare through the intergenerational sharing of risks.
sentences.chinese: 養老金體系通過兩代間分擔風險而促進福利事業。
